content: I know that celebrating my birthday here in Bitcointalk forum is off-topic to start with. So, to make this thread belong in Beginners & Help. I decided to give or reward smerit (I won't tell the total of smerits I currently have) to Newbies up to Member rank. This thread is kinda a remembrance of some sort that I reach Hero Member rank and It's almost 1 year since I became a Hero Member (I celebrate ranking up to Hero Member on November 14, 2021 and I am also celebrating my birthday). Since there is an occasion, I would like to reward merit to those who deserves it. To receive or earn a merit from me is very simple and easy, all you have to do is follow the rules and format when you submit your entry. I will check post history of each participant.Rules:• Accounts that are created after this thread is posted are not eligible to join.• Entry submitted that didn't use the format I provided won't earn a single merit.• Only Newbies, Jr. Members and Members, Full Members and Sr. Members are eligible to join/participate.• Only one entry can be submitted per week. (Depends if I still have smerit left next week)• I have the rights to change/add new rules.Format:Code:Username: Nakamura12Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1726595Rank: Hero MemberUPDATE: 6 SMERITS LEFTThis thread will be Self-moderated. If you submitted your entry more than once then other will be deleted.
